responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "88A6D9D0425B17CE697ADB842158C253", "The Star of Ozu was crafted and refined within the city of Sephillion by Ozu the Light of Sephillion. Its purpose is to siphon essence from points of weakness within the veil of reality. It could project spells of mass affects from its many facets. After the disappearance of Ozu, the Star of Ozu and its spell rituals were seized and locked away in Carphin by the Council of Mages for the safety of all. The knoiwledge of Ozu has spoken.")
name: MADD_0005A_SNB_KnowledgeOfOzu_10
